Darkfate::

Darkfate saw at Dragonfly claimed the pod and used his comm link in 
Killfest's, dRillbit, Blacknighmare and his troop frecuaency.

"Here's Darkfate"  said the male bot "I'm found an protophorm and one 
of Megs followers it's here.. I guess that Megatron could be around 
with his troops and will have a fight... I request your precense here 
to hold the prothoporm and destrouy our enemies " 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He looks out of a view port. He sees Megatron and his guys 
retreating.
> He then sees Apoc go after them.
> "Killfest, Megatron is escaping. Apoc is chasing them. Its your 
call.
> What do we do?"
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He waits but no one comes.
> "Ooooooooooooo k, where are they?"
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He makes his way back to the Alliance base, and gets to a CR.
